spec_data.Name: rubygem-jbuilder
spec_data.Description:
Jbuilder gives you a simple DSL for declaring JSON structures that beats
massaging giant hash structures. This is particularly helpful when
the generation process is fraught with conditionals and loops.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 04:42:13 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Create JSON structures via a Builder-style DSL
